mapper.select: SELECT OG.PRTNR_KNM || '(' || OG.PRTNR_NO || ')' AS EMPL_NM /* 성명 */ , OG.OG_NM AS BLG /* 소속 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'RSB_DV_CD', OG.RSB_DV_CD) AS RSB /* 직책 */ , CEIL(MONTHS_BETWEEN(#{perfYm} || '01', OG.CNTR_DT)) + 1 AS CW_MM /* 차월 */ , H.HMST_GD_VAL AS PRTNR_GD_CD /* 급수 */ , NVL(EDU.ASET_EDUC_PTCP_DC,0) AS ASET_EDUC_PTCP_DC /* 집합교육참여일수 */ , NVL(EDU.ACPN_EDUC_PTCP_DC,0) AS ACPN_EDUC_PTCP_DC /* 동행교육참여일수 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(OG.CNTR_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM') AS CNTR_YM /* 업무등록월 */ , SELL.SELL_ACKMT_CT /* 총판매건수 */ , C.SV_CT /* 서비스건수 */ , C.SV_PROC_RT /* 서비스처리율 */ , SELL.HCR_MSH /* 홈케어멤버십 */ , SELL.MATT_RTLFE /* 매트리스 렌탈료 */ , SELL.MATT_EXCP_RTLFE /* 매트리스 외 렌탈료 */ , SELL.ENVR_ELHM_PERF_AMT /* 환경가전 일시불 */ , SELL.ENVR_ELHM_EXCP_PERF_AMT /* 환경가전 외 일시불 */ , FEE.INTBS_AMT /* 과표계 */ , FEE.DDCTAM /* 공제계 */ , FEE.DSB_OJ_AMT /* 실지급액 */ FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ OG LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DSB_YM , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , SUM(INTBS_AMT) AS INTBS_AMT /* 소득과표금액 */ , SUM(DDCTAM) AS DDCTAM /* 공제금액 */ , SUM(DSB_OJ_AMT) AS DSB_OJ_AMT /* 지급대상금액 */ FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ /* 수수료지급내역 */ WHERE DSB_YM = #{perfYm} AND CO_CD = '2000' AND OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND (INTBS_AMT > 0 OR DDCTAM > 0 OR DSB_OJ_AMT > 0) AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY DSB_YM, OG_TP_CD, PRTNR_NO ) FEE ON FEE.DSB_YM = OG.BASE_YM AND FEE.OG_TP_CD = OG.OG_TP_CD AND FEE.PRTNR_NO = OG.PRTNR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PRTNR_NO , OG_TP_CD , BASE_YM , SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_ATC_CD = 'W03P00002' THEN PERF_VAL ELSE 0 END) AS SELL_ACKMT_CT /* 판매인정건수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_ATC_CD = 'W03P00123' THEN PERF_VAL ELSE 0 END) AS HCR_MSH /* 홈케어멤베십 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_ATC_CD = 'W00P00031' THEN PERF_VAL ELSE 0 END) AS MATT_RTLFE /* 매트리스렌탈료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_ATC_CD = 'W03P00122' THEN PERF_VAL ELSE 0 END) AS MATT_EXCP_RTLFE /* 매트리스 외 렌탈료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_ATC_CD = 'W00P00004' THEN PERF_VAL ELSE 0 END) AS ENVR_ELHM_PERF_AMT /* (기준금액)환경가전－일시 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN PERF_ATC_CD = 'W00P00006' THEN PERF_VAL ELSE 0 END) AS ENVR_ELHM_EXCP_PERF_AMT /* (기준금액)환경외－일시불 */ FROM TB_FEAM_NTORP_PERF_MM_CL /* 순주문파트너실적월마감 */ WHERE PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND PERF_AGRG_CRT_DV_CD = '301' AND PERF_DV_CD = '0' GROUP BY PRTNR_NO, OG_TP_CD, BASE_YM ) SELL ON SELL.PRTNR_NO = OG.PRTNR_NO AND SELL.OG_TP_CD = OG.OG_TP_CD AND SELL.BASE_YM = OG.BASE_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT EDUC_CRSE_CRT_BASE_YM , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , SUM(ASET_EDUC_PTCP_DC) AS ASET_EDUC_PTCP_DC , SUM(ACPN_EDUC_PTCP_DC) AS ACPN_EDUC_PTCP_DC FROM ( SELECT EDUC_CRSE_CRT_BASE_YM , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , CASE WHEN EDUC_CRSE_NO = '124' THEN EDUC_PRSC_DC ELSE 0 END AS ASET_EDUC_PTCP_DC , CASE WHEN EDUC_CRSE_NO = '125' THEN EDUC_PRSC_DC ELSE 0 END AS ACPN_EDUC_PTCP_DC FROM TB_PSCA_MCPTN_EDUC_IZ WHERE EDUC_CRSE_CRT_BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND EDUC_CRSE_NO IN ('124', '125') ) GROUP BY EDUC_CRSE_CRT_BASE_YM, OG_TP_CD, PRTNR_NO ) EDU ON OG.BASE_YM = EDU.EDUC_CRSE_CRT_BASE_YM AND OG.OG_TP_CD = EDU.OG_TP_CD AND OG.PRTNR_NO = EDU.PRTNR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BASE_YM , OG_TP_CD , PRTNR_NO , SUM(CASE WHEN PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD = 'HM01999902' THEN PERF_VAL END) + SUM(CASE WHEN PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD = 'HM01999903' THEN PERF_VAL END) AS SV_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD = 'HM01999909' THEN PERF_VAL END) AS SV_PROC_RT FROM TB_FEAM_WPTN_SV_PERF_AGRG WHERE BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND CL_DV_CD = '02' AND OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND PRTNR_SV_PERF_ATC_CD IN ('HM01999902', 'HM01999903', 'HM01999909') GROUP BY BASE_YM, OG_TP_CD, PRTNR_NO ) C ON C.BASE_YM = OG.BASE_YM AND C.OG_TP_CD = OG.OG_TP_CD AND C.PRTNR_NO = OG.PRTNR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEAM_HMST_GD_BAS H ON OG.BASE_YM = H.MNGT_YM AND OG.PRTNR_NO = H.PRTNR_NO WHERE OG.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND OG.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND OG.PRTNR_NO = #{no}

SELECT MAX(ITEM1) AS ITEM1 , MAX(FVAL1) AS FVAL1 , MAX(ITEM2) AS ITEM2 , MAX(FVAL2) AS FVAL2 , MAX(ITEM3) AS ITEM3 , MAX(FVAL3) AS FVAL3 , MAX(ITEM4) AS ITEM4 , MAX(FVAL4) AS FVAL4 FROM ( SELECT NVL(T2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, T1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS ITEM1 , TO_CHAR(NVL(T4.FEE_ATC_VAL, 0)) AS FVAL1 , '' AS ITEM2 , '' AS FVAL2 , '' AS ITEM3 , '' AS FVAL3 , '' AS ITEM4 , '' AS FVAL4 , ROWNUM AS SEQ FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD T1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL T2 ON T1.FEE_CD = T2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T2.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '04' /* 04: 판매수수료 */ AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S2.FEE_CD , S2.FEE_ATC_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ S1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ S2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON S1.DSB_YM = S2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.CO_CD = S2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = S2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = S2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = S2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = S2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ ) T4 ON T3.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD WHERE T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T1.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION SELECT '' AS ITEM1 , '' AS FVAL1 , NVL(T2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, T1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS ITEM2 , TO_CHAR(NVL(T4.FEE_ATC_VAL, 0)) AS FVAL2 , '' AS ITEM3 , '' AS FVAL3 , '' AS ITEM4 , '' AS FVAL4 , ROWNUM AS SEQ FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD T1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL T2 ON T1.FEE_CD = T2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T2.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '05' /* 05: 서비스수수료 */ AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S2.FEE_CD , S2.FEE_ATC_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ S1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ S2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON S1.DSB_YM = S2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.CO_CD = S2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = S2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = S2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = S2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = S2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ ) T4 ON T3.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD WHERE T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T1.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION SELECT '' AS ITEM1 , '' AS FVAL1 , '' AS ITEM2 , '' AS FVAL2 , NVL(T2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, T1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS ITEM3 , TO_CHAR(NVL(T4.FEE_ATC_VAL, 0)) AS FVAL3 , '' AS ITEM4 , '' AS FVAL4 , ROWNUM AS SEQ FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD T1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL T2 ON T1.FEE_CD = T2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T2.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '06' /* 06: 교육수수료 */ AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S2.FEE_CD , S2.FEE_ATC_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ S1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ S2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON S1.DSB_YM = S2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.CO_CD = S2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = S2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = S2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = S2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = S2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ ) T4 ON T3.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD WHERE T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T1.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' UNION SELECT '' AS ITEM1 , '' AS FVAL1 , '' AS ITEM2 , '' AS FVAL2 , '' AS ITEM3 , '' AS FVAL3 , NVL(T2.SRN_MARK_FEE_NM, T1.BAS_SRN_MARK_FEE_NM) AS ITEM4 , TO_CHAR(NVL(T4.FEE_ATC_VAL, 0)) AS FVAL4 , ROWNUM AS SEQ FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CD T1 INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_BASE_DTL T2 ON T1.FEE_CD = T2.FEE_CD AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T2.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T2.FEE_BASE_STAT_CD = '02' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD_DTL T3 ON T2.FEE_CD = T3.FEE_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.FEE_ATC_TP_CD = '03' /* 03: 조직수수료 */ AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T2.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S2.FEE_CD , S2.FEE_ATC_VAL FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_IZ S1 /* 수수료지급내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ S2 /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ ON S1.DSB_YM = S2.DSB_YM /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.CO_CD = S2.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = S2.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = S2.PRTNR_NO /* 파트너번호 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = S2.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = S2.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD /* 추가지급구분코드 */ AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.DSB_YM = #{perfYm} /* 지급년월 */ AND S1.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' /* 수수료차수구분코드 */ AND S1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' /* 조직유형코드 */ AND S1.CO_CD = '2000' /* 회사코드 */ AND S1.PRTNR_NO = #{no} /* 파트너번호 */ /* @OZParam.AKDCDE@ */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_DV_CD = '01' /* 수수료항목구분코드 = 01 : 수수료 */ AND S2.FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 /* 수수료항목값 */ ) T4 ON T3.FEE_CD = T4.FEE_CD WHERE T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND #{perfYm} BETWEEN T1.APY_STRT_YM AND T1.APY_END_YM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) M GROUP BY SEQ ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT SUM(ERNTX) AS ERNTX , SUM(RSDNTX) AS RSDNTX , SUM(RDS) AS RDS , SUM(HIR_INSR) AS HIR_INSR , SUM(INDD_INSR) AS INDD_INSR , SUM(BU_DDTN) AS BU_DDTN , SUM(PNPYAM) AS PNPYAM , SUM(ERNTX) + SUM(RSDNTX) + SUM(RDS) + SUM(HIR_INSR) + SUM(INDD_INSR) + SUM(BU_DDTN) + SUM(PNPYAM) AS DDTN_SUM FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = '02' THEN FEE_ATC_VAL ELSE 0 END AS ERNTX /* 소득세 */ , CASE WHEN FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = '03' THEN FEE_ATC_VAL ELSE 0 END AS RSDNTX /* 주민세 */ , CASE WHEN FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = '01' THEN FEE_ATC_VAL ELSE 0 END AS RDS /* RDS,보증예치금 */ , CASE WHEN FEE_DDTN_TP_CD IN ('05', '96') THEN FEE_ATC_VAL ELSE 0 END AS HIR_INSR /* 고용보험 */ , CASE WHEN FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = '06' THEN FEE_ATC_VAL ELSE 0 END AS INDD_INSR /* 산재보험 */ , CASE WHEN FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = '07' THEN FEE_ATC_VAL ELSE 0 END AS BU_DDTN /* 부담공제 */ , CASE WHEN FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = '04' THEN FEE_ATC_VAL ELSE 0 END AS PNPYAM /* 가지급금 */ FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DSB_DTL_IZ /* 수수료지급상세내역 */ WHERE DSB_YM = #{perfYm} AND CO_CD = '2000' AND OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND FEE_ATC_VAL > 0 )

SELECT M.DIV , M.ITEM , M.CTR_BF , M.CTR_AF , M.RSN , M.CTR_DTM , A.PRTNR_KNM AS CTRR FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ A INNER JOIN ( SELECT '공제' AS DIV , B.FEE_DDTN_TP_NM AS ITEM , A.FEE_DDCTAM AS CTR_BF , A.FEE_DDTN_CNFM_AMT AS CTR_AF , A.FEE_CTR_RSON_CN AS RSN , A.FNL_MDFC_DTM AS CTR_DTM , A.FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD AS FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD , A.FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO AS FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_DDTN_IZ A INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_DDTN_TP_CD B ON A.FEE_DDTN_TP_CD = B.FEE_DDTN_TP_CD AND B.APY_STRT_YM <= #{perfYm} WHERE A.DDTN_YM = #{perfYm} AND A.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND A.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND A.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = '01' UNION ALL SELECT '수수료' AS DIV , B.FEE_NM AS ITEM , A.FEE_CALC_AMT AS CTR_BF , A.FEE_CTR_CNFM_AMT AS CTR_AF , A.FEE_CTR_RSON_CN AS RSN , A.FNL_MDFC_DTM AS CTR_DTM , A.FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD AS FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD , A.FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO AS FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_FEAM_FEE_CALC_BAS A INNER JOIN TB_FEAM_FEE_CD B ON A.FEE_CD = B.FEE_CD WHERE A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} AND A.OG_TP_CD = 'W03' AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{no} AND A.FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = '02' AND A.SPMT_DSB_DV_CD = '01' ) M ON A.PRTNR_NO = M.FEE_CTR_PRTNR_NO AND A.OG_TP_CD = M.FEE_CTR_OG_TP_CD WHERE A.BASE_YM = #{perfYm} ORDER BY M.DIV, M.ITEM
